channel.title: Hooking up your server with moparscape client?
channel.description: hey, so i really want to hook up my f2p server with the moparscape client. like i want to play my server in the moparscape client. however i have not portforwarded yet. i was under the impression that i can play on the client, without port forwarding, as long it is only me playing. can someone tell me how, or give me a link to a tut that tells how to hook up your server with the moparscape client? thank you.

item.title: Hooking up your server with moparscape client?
item.dc:creator: @ProjectPvpTehe ProjectPvpTehe
item.description:
@ProjectPvpTehe wrote:

Hamachi or go to Portforward.com and learn how to portforward.

Read full topic
item.source: Hooking up your server with moparscape client?

item.title: Hooking up your server with moparscape client?
item.dc:creator: @saminator7 saminator7
item.description:
@saminator7 wrote:

hey, so i really want to hook up my f2p server with the moparscape client. like i want to play my server in the moparscape client. however i have not portforwarded yet. i was under the impression that i can play on the client, without port forwarding, as long it is only me playing. can someone tell me how, or give me a link to a tut that tells how to hook up your server with the moparscape client?
thank you.
